DOC.brief_summary: This study is comparing 45 minute and 30 minute treatment durations with the UVX corneal cross linking system to treat corneal infections.
DOC.brief_title: Cross Linking for Treatment of Corneal Infection
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of infectious keratitis corneal ulcer that has perforated corneal ulcer that has produced a descemetocele women who are pregnant or breastfeeding patients who are immunocompromised or unwilling or unable to comply with a medication regimen
